daily.description: Collect your daily bonus and earn koins (The Kael currency).

work.description: Trabalhe e consiga alguns trocados no Kael.

bank.description: Obtenha o saldo líquido de koins do servidor.

randomname.description: Gere um nome aleátorio de algum personagem de Harry Potter.

help.description: Receive information to view my functions.

balance.description: Visualize your wallet with reputation and money.

points.description: Have access to the ranking of points of houses.

avatar.description: Shows your or someone else's profile picture.

userinfo.description: Get information relevant over your or of one determined user.

deposit.description: Have information on how to deposit your money in the bank.

withdraw.description: Withdraw a specific amount from your bank to your wallet.

tankionline.description: View your stats on Tanki Online (EN) or for a specific player.

ban.description: Apply one banishment in a determined user.

kick.description: Apply one expulsion in a determined user.

purge.description: Clear a number specific messages in one channel or from a determined user.

reputation.description: Give a friend a point of reputation.

perfection.description: Dê um ponto de perfeição a um amiguinho(a).

charisma.description: Dê um ponto de carisma a um amiguinho(a).

intelligence.description: Dê um ponto de inteligência a um amiguinho(a).

ranking.description: Visualize o ranking global dos pontos sociais.

profile.description: Visualize seu estiloso perfil ou de um amiguinho(a).

rob.description: Consiga um dinheiro roubando de outro usuário.

transfer.description: Transfira koins do seu banco para seus amiguinhos.

count.description: Have a list informations of as to set up the system of counter of members.

houseroles.description: Have access a list informations add or remove points of one determined house.

housepoints.description: Tenha acesso a uma lista de informações para adicionar ou remover pontos de uma determinada casa.
